Title: Fall 1996 Course CSCI 577a
Body: Date: Wednesday, 20-Nov-96 23:29:58 GMT Server: NCSA/1.3 MIME-version: 1.0 Content-type: text/html Fall 1996 Course CSCI 577a Fall 1996 Course CS577a Design and Construction of Large Software Systems: Software Engineering I - Plans, Processes, Requirements, and Architectures Commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) software products, interactive networked information systems, new management approaches, and new process models are significantly changing the nature of software engineering.
